website_summaries.verdict: This roomy steamer pot set is constructed of stainless steel with durable, riveted handles.
pros: This 5-quart pot set is roomy enough to cook for several people at once
Components are made of stainless steel and are also both induction cooktop-friendly as well as dishwasher safe
cons: Some reports of tarnish/discoloration of the interior with normal use
The handles can get hot during use
Company doesn't indicate cooking temperature maximum

customer_reviews.title: Culina is proud with their products, I am not!
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this review because Culina writes me how they are proud with their products. So .. .. the bottom surface of the pot was grainy from the day one and after first use shows minor trails of rust. I'm going to use it several more times and if it is going to become worse will definitely return the steamer.
customer_reviews.author: Igor P.

customer_reviews.title: Don't know why they send me the used one The ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't know why they send me the used one The steamer is dark and burned. I just returned it on the same day
customer_reviews.author: Chao lee

customer_reviews.title: Steamer kettle with Safety Hazard top cover.
customer_reviews.text: At 5 quarts, this streamer can easily steam 2# of vegetables at one time. With the brand name of Culina, I was disappointed to discover this steamer is made in China. The bottom and steamer insert are well designed and impressive in appearance with sturdy handles. The top cover is a safety hazard. The top cover handle is to small and to close to the top for a person to get a good sturdy grip on the handle for removing the 10-inch diameter stainless steel top. During the seaming of vegetables, steam escapes horizontally around the top cover perimeter. The bottom of the Steamer Cookware is an excellent soup kettle.
customer_reviews.author: Cougar97738

customer_reviews.title: A Better Steamer
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful on the outside, as shown. Inside, am not sure it is better stainless steel in the basket as claimed. After all, it is made in you-know-where. This is the reason for 3 stars.. That being said, vegetables taste a lot better than when using a plastic basket in my rice cooker, and this steamer is much larger. One can actually cook enough vegetables as a diabetic is supposed to eat in a meal (half of a 9" plate, per accredited diabetic treatment center.) Like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Toshiooi

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful All-Purpose Steamer and Pan
customer_reviews.text: This is a great steamer. High quality thick stainless steel, sturdy handles, and smooth finish make this a breeze to use and to clean. You can also just use the steamer bottom part as a large pan for a multitude of uses. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: HC W

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for "reheating" left over white rice!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for steaming left over rice (the best method to reheat left over white rice). It works great! Very versatile - I also use the pot for boiling small amount of pasta and reheating left over stew. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Coconut Lover

customer_reviews.title: For the price I’m totally impressed with this steamer.
customer_reviews.text: For the price I’m totally impressed with this steamer. It is well made and a quality product it also fits a lot of vegetables
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hans

customer_reviews.title: Returning it!
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, but beware of the quality! I boiled water, 6 times. Each time there is a chalky white residue inside. So I did a "test" & boiled water in my old Stainless Steel pan of another brand & it had no film. I think this pan is LEACHING METAL! I am returning it!
customer_reviews.author: Emmamom

customer_reviews.title: does everything well but steam.
customer_reviews.text: well made, water comes to boil quickly. however, not enough steam comes through the relatively few and small holes in the steamer basket to cook the food. we are returning. too bad as it was the right size and good quality. the company should look at a chinese steamer.
customer_reviews.author: Youth in Asia

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. I agree with all the positive reviews
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. I agree with all the positive reviews. I use this pot every day to steam my vegetables. It conducts heat very well. I noticed water comes to a boil faster than in my other 18/10 cookware and it looks gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: This Culina Steamer arrived in perfect condition and is beautiful in appearance with the design ...
customer_reviews.text: This Culina Steamer arrived in perfect condition and is beautiful in appearance with the design and outside finish being comparable to high end cookware. When I received it, I initially gave it 5 stars but have downgraded my rating after using the pot for the first time, cooking chicken soup in it for about 40 minutes and finding, to my surprise, when washing it afterwards, that there was a rainbow of colors on the inside/bottom of the pot [from the heat] which I really didn't expect and that never happened with my All Clad pots. I am happy with the design, utility, and price of this steamer, though the quality of the base is not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: My Favorite Things

customer_reviews.title: Culina Steamer Set!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful set! I looked around in my local department and kitchen shops and could not find a set as heavy and well made as this. Most of the sets I found were smaller or not as good as quality as this set and were priced much higher.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Cork

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made.. easy to use.. Like it much better than the smaller versions.. Good price also.
customer_reviews.author: Big Sky 77

customer_reviews.title: steamer review.
customer_reviews.text: I like the steamer but I wonder why the inside bottom has discolored. I have only used it as steamer so far and have only used it for a short while. Is this normal and is it harmful?
customer_reviews.author: Frances R. Clancy

customer_reviews.title: You'll be happy!
customer_reviews.text: wonderful cookware, love the insert too, couldn't be happier. Great price for a wonderful pot.
customer_reviews.author: EEW

customer_reviews.title: The size is perfect for the number of people we plan to serve
customer_reviews.text: Have not used it yet, but it appears to be very well made. The size is perfect for the number of people we plan to serve.
customer_reviews.author: Richard G. Kinard

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used this, I boiled water in it (using it as a double boiler) and it left hard water stains that I can't get off. (at least that's what I'm guessing it is) I washed it and dried it by hand as soon as I got it, then again right after I used it, but I can't get these awful stains off it. Rather being smooth, stainless steel, it feels cheap now.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Santarelli

customer_reviews.title: BIG!
customer_reviews.text: This was bigger than I thought when I ordered it, but glad to receive it. High quality material and speedy shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Fazenbaker

customer_reviews.title: Professional chef quality and household price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Without exaggeration, the quality and diversity of this product exceeds even commercial, professional chef needs! Highest recommendation!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the and use it all the time for steaming veggies.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: This also cleans up so easy. I love this product and will definitely order ...
customer_reviews.text: After reading about the negative heath affects of non-stick cookware and the healthier benefits of steamed foods, I found this! I was worried about food sticking or burning but that has not been the case. This also cleans up so easy. I love this product and will definitely order more to replace my other cookware.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for family or one person who steams most ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Perfect size for family or one person who steams most of their food. Nice size basket.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Steamer for Me
customer_reviews.text: This works perfect for steaming my veggies. It even shows you where your water level should be for steaming.

customer_reviews.title: I recently ordered this steamer and I love it. I can use it as a steamer ...
customer_reviews.text: I recently ordered this steamer and I love it. I can use it as a steamer and also use it for a soup or sauce pan. Very practical purchase. I have never purchased a Culina product before, but I will be looking at their line now. I am completely pleased with the quality.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: Great steamer. A little larger than I needed but very well made.

customer_reviews.text: Love this steamer. No more steaming my hands as I get the veggies out.

customer_reviews.title: perfect for steaming crabs
customer_reviews.text: Heats up very quickly on a gas grill, perfect for steaming crabs.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: All Clad quality. Very heavy duty, good looking, works great, if it had All Clad stamped on it I wouldn’t bat an eye.

customer_reviews.title: Love this Steamer Pot set!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful Stainless Steel Steamer set. It not only met, but exceeded all my hopes for a good steamer pot set, in it's quality, size, height, width, and capacity. Really love it!!!

customer_reviews.title: Satisfaction guaranteed!
customer_reviews.text: Satisfaction guaranteed! It looks great, cooks great,and cleans easy. I highly recommend this steamer to anyone who desires to cook and eat healthy!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am happy to say this this pot is everything I hoped it would be!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best pan I've ever owned. Great for pasta. Made very well.

customer_reviews.title: but she says it is perfect. She uses it every day for vegetables
customer_reviews.text: This is my wife's first steamer. She loves it. I was worried it would be too small, but she says it is perfect. She uses it every day for vegetables. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A. E. McDowell

customer_reviews.title: May be great or may not I didn't use it.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't use it because of a warning on the box. It would have been nice if that warning would have been on the page so that I and Amazon wouldn't have to go through a return process. I am trying to get healthy so I am not at increased risk of getting Cancer. Yet this contains chemical(s) known to cause it. Maybe the warning doesn't mean anything I don't know but I would rather not risk it especially since my dad and his dad died of cancer.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality......Poor Rating
customer_reviews.text: I was not happy with the quality of this steamer. After only three uses, the stainless steel on the inside bottom of the pot began wearing off so as to reveal the aluminum core. I returned the steamer.
customer_reviews.author: Janice  E Nichols

customer_reviews.title: A Great Tool in the Kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: To begin with, when we purchased this item, we saw several people leaving reviews who had been given this item. We were not given any product. We purchased this at full price. We were very hesitant about purchasing it, but felt it was worth the risk, since we could not find anything else like it on Amazon, and were in need of a steamer with an insert. We have not been disappointed!!! It is as shiny today as it was the day we got it. The numbers on the inside are also staying on, with no fading. We have also used the base pot for boiling a variety of items. We really don't have anything bad to say about it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Lugg

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the first steamer for my parents over a year ago; had the opportunity to steam clams at their house and loved it. The design of the cooker keeps it from steaming over onto the stove top which is what we have always had to contend with using our other steamer. Worked perfectly, cleaned up nice so we purchased one for ourselves.
customer_reviews.author: Kbreezy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, it is 18/10
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, it is 18/10. Washes nicely. I do drain it then dry to put away anyway. Don't use steamer basket but can be used for various things as rinsing fruits and vegetables etc. After using several times, the scratches I put in by stirring pasta with fork, however, it seems to have a few pitt markings inside after the 3rd use I don't know how. I was going to order another for engagement present, but feel if it happens to couple they might think it was cheap. It does the job any way. I use the scrub daddy sponge that does not scratch.
customer_reviews.author: zuleko

customer_reviews.title: Never Culina
customer_reviews.text: Stay away from this junk. After boilng water just once, the bottom got discolored. The manufacturer's customer service asked for a photo of the damaged area, promised to replace it -- nothing happened. Just silence. Stay away from Culina products. On top of it, it's made in China.
customer_reviews.author: wertyu

customer_reviews.title: We love steamed veggies and it is a part of our ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this pot almost everyday. We love steamed veggies and it is a part of our whole food plant based diet. They veggies come out perfectly steamed. I steam potatoes rather than boil for potato salad. Delicious! I could go on and on.
customer_reviews.author: susan.vance

customer_reviews.title: Great cookware!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Culina steamer set as a gift for Christmas. Later, I got to use it as I was helping to cook and I loved it so much that I bought myself one! The weightiness of it makes it feel so durable. The steamer pot is the perfect size to steam vegetables for a family of four or more and it works on induction stovetops.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: a great price for a high quality
customer_reviews.text: purchase one of this and an all clad at 3 times higher price they cook the same the finish is the same on both "absolutely beautiful"

customer_reviews.title: Great pot
customer_reviews.text: I love this pot. I’ve had it for about a month now. I’ve used it several times to steam veggies. It washes easily and contrary to some of the reviews I read...mine has not tarnished or discolored.
customer_reviews.author: PharmD1906

customer_reviews.title: This is a great quality, low priced steamer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality, low priced steamer. Now, I'm really enjoying my steamed veggies. And, its large enough to cook for several people.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Delicious healthy veggies with minimal effort.
customer_reviews.text: This is an easy to use pot/steamer. Just put some water in the bottom and let it boil then put some fresh or frozen veggies in teh steamer insert and you've got a healthy side dish in minutes. Easy to use and clean.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I need.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I need a bigger steamer to steam several different veggies at a time. Nice product for under 40 bucks.

customer_reviews.title: High capacity ~ High quality!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome high capacity steamer or use it for soup. I wanted a larger size steamer and this one fit the bill. It si stylish and sizeable to fit all that I need to put inside. I'm just thrilled with the quality and overall appearance. If you need a larger steamer ~ I recommend this one for sure!

customer_reviews.title: This three piece pot/steamer is excellent quality. I've used it to steam a large ...
customer_reviews.text: This three piece pot/steamer is excellent quality. I've used it to steam a large head of cut up broccoli and to cook ears of corn. The heat distribution is very effective as it cooks. The finish is really shiny and nice and it's a substantial weight. Definitely recommend.

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love this steaner, it's a great size for a small family and I am in love with the rounded bubble look of this steamer pot which is different from a lot of other pots and I get a lot of compliments on how cute it looks!

customer_reviews.title: I am considering getting more culina cookware as this is a nice, heavy pot which heats quickly
customer_reviews.text: We use this pot daily. It's much easier to clean than a steamer basket insert. I am considering getting more culina cookware as this is a nice, heavy pot which heats quickly.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding steamer, great construction
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful cookware. Next time I need to replace a pan in my cookware, I'm going to look at this brand. The steamer works perfectly, is large enough to steam many servings of food, cleans up easily, and is durable. Rivets instead of screws, so nothing is loose.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, beautiful style and the price was lower than the retailers price!

customer_reviews.text: Too beautiful to use, actually I'm kidding. The cookware comes out as shiny as it appears even after washes. Great item, good buy!

customer_reviews.title: Steamer
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved his gift it did have some spots small on bottom inside but barkeepers cleanser and took away spots except 1-2 he said !

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality! The steamer insert can be lifted out without spilling the contents (unlike the fan-folding steamers that fit inside saucepans), and is the perfect size to steam a batch of veggies for 8-10 people. The lower stock pot can then be used to make soup, pasta, rice, or mashed potatoes with the remaining water. It's very efficient and highly recommended for people who cook for large groups.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product. It looks
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. It looks, feels and it well built. I have used it and it conducts heat well and is large enough to steam veggies for a party.

customer_reviews.title: Culina Steamer Cookware with Insert 18/10 Heavy Gauge Stainless Steel 5 Qt Silver
customer_reviews.text: Works well for steaming veggies, shellfish, and other foods. Very easy to clean.

product_meta.title: Culina Steamer Cookware with Insert 18/10 Heavy Gauge Stainless Steel 5 Qt Silver
product_meta.description: Fill your kitchen with the delicious aroma of soups, stews, pasta and countless other delicious and healthy recipes when you cook with the Culina 5-Quart Steamer Pot. With an included stainless-steel perforated steamer insert, you can easily steam a variety of garden-fresh vegetables to make healthy, nutrient-rich meals for the entire family. A large 5-Quart capacity pot makes it easy to cook for the entire family, with handy measurement markings on the inside to ensure correct water levels. The encapsulated aluminum base allows for superior conductivity and even heat distribution, eliminating those annoying hotspots that are common with other cookware. The perforated, stainless-steel steamer basket has a large handle, making it easy to lift and remove from the pot. The lid (which is heavier than most brands) sits snug and secure, sealing in flavors, nutrients and moisture. Constructed from durable 18/10 stainless steel, the Steamer Pot includes cast loop handles that are securely riveted and stay cool to the touch, allowing you to safely carry. All edges are curved to safely pour hot liquids without spilling. All parts are dishwasher-safe, but you will probably prefer hand-washing (and immediate drying) to preserve the beautiful finish. With elegant design and superior construction, the Culina 5-Quart Steamer Cookware offers the same high quality as the other leading brands without paying extra for their logo. This sleek, versatile cookware is so durable that, with the proper care, it will give you years of dedicated use. This set makes a wonderful gift for the amateur and professional chef alike and comes with a lifetime warranty. We're so sure that you will love this cookware set that we offer a 100% Culina Satisfaction Guarantee.
feature_bullets: Includes 5-Quart Pot with 4.5-Quart Perforated Steamer Insert - Encapsulated aluminum core
Durable 18/10 Stainless Steel with elegant mirror finish
